name: Absorb
effect: Restores 540 Magicka when you block a spell.

name: Absorb Missile
effect:
Bolster your defenses, gaining a damage shield that absorbs up to 2709 damage for 6 seconds.  

While the shield persists, you are healed for 1398 Health the next time a harmful Direct Damage projectile hits you.  This effect can occur once per cast.

This ability scales off your Maximum Health.

name: Absorption Field
effect:
Create a globe of magic suppression for 12 seconds, removing and preventing all enemy area of effect abilities from occurring in the area.

Enemies within the globe are stunned, while enemy players will be silenced rather than stunned.

The globe also heals you and your allies for 204 Health every 0.5 seconds.

name: Accelerate
effect: Bend time and space around you to gain Major Expedition for 4 seconds and Minor Force for 12 seconds, increasing your Movement Speed by 30% and Critical Damage by 10%.

name: Accelerated Growth
effect: When you heal yourself or an ally under 40% Health with a Green Balance ability you gain Major Mending, increasing your Healing Done by 25% for 3 seconds.

name: Accuracy
effect: Increases Weapon Critical rating by 1095.

name: Accursed Charge
effect: Spring across the battlefield to smash an enemy, dealing 10640 Physical Damage.

name: Acid Spray
effect: Fire a burst of arrows in one shot, dealing 684 Poison Damage to enemies in front of you, and dealing an additional 508 Poison Damage over 4 seconds.

name: Acrobat
effect:
Increases your experience gain with the Bow skill line by 15%.

Decreases your fall damage taken by 10%.

name: Adrenaline Rush
effect: When you deal direct damage, you restore 950 Stamina. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.

name: Advanced Species
effect:
Increases your damage done by 2% for each Animal Companion ability slotted.

Current Bonus: 0%.

name: Aggressive Horn
effect:
Sound a war horn to rally your forces, increasing you and your group's Maximum Magicka and Maximum Stamina by 10% for 30 seconds.

You and your allies gain Major Force, increasing your Critical Damage by 15% for 10 seconds.

name: Agility
effect: Increases your Weapon Damage by 15%.

name: Agony Totem
effect:
Summon an effigy of bone at your feet that gives Minor Protection to you and your allies for 11 seconds, reducing damage taken by 8%. 

After 2 seconds, the totem begins fearing nearby enemies every 2 seconds, causing them to cower in place for 4 seconds.

Allies can activate Pure Agony, causing enemies to take 168 Magic Damage over 5 seconds and applying Minor Vulnerability to them, increasing their damage taken by 8%.

name: Ambush
effect:
Flash through the shadows and ambush an enemy, dealing 565 Physical Damage and afflicting them with Minor Vulnerability for 10 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 8%.

Also grants you Empower for 5 seconds, increasing the damage of your next Light Attack by 40%.

name: Amphibian
effect:
Increases your experience gain with the Restoration Staff skill line by 15%.

Increases your swimming speed by 50%.

name: Amplitude
effect: Increases your damage done against enemies by 1% for every 10% current Health they have.

name: Ancient Knowledge
effect:
Equipping a Flame Staff increases your damage done with single target abilities by 8%.

Equipping a Lightning Staff increases your damage done with area of effect abilities by 8%.

Equipping a Frost Staff reduces the cost of blocking by 36% and increases the amount of damage you block by 20%.

name: Animate Blastbones
effect:
Bring your allies back from the brink of death, resurrecting up to 3 allies at the target location.

You consume up to 3 other corpses in the area and summon a Blastbones for each corpse consumed.

name: Annulment
effect: Convert a portion of your Magicka into a protective ward, gaining a damage shield that absorbs 2465 damage for 6 seconds. Damage shield strength capped at 50% of your Maximum Health.

name: Anti-Cavalry Caltrops
effect:
Hurl a ball of caltrops that scatter over the target area, dealing 77 Physical Damage every 1 second to enemies inside, and reducing their Movement Speed by 50%.

The caltrops rapidly drain the Mount Stamina of any enemy in the area.

name: Antiquarian Insight
effect: Allows you to scry for Antiquities of up to Ultimate difficulty.

name: Arctic Blast
effect:
Envelop yourself in winter winds, instantly healing for 2258 Health and an additional 270 Health every 1 second over 5 seconds.

While the effect persists the winds pulse outwards, dealing 154 Frost Damage every 1 second to nearby enemies.  Enemies hit by this effect 3 times are stunned for 4 seconds.

This healing from this ability scales with your Maximum Health.

name: Arctic Wind
effect:
Envelop yourself in winter winds, instantly healing for 2258 Health and an additional 270 Health every 1 second over 5 seconds.

While the effect persists the winds pulse outwards, dealing 153 Frost Damage every 1 second to nearby enemies.

This healing from this ability scales with your Maximum Health.

name: Argonian Resistance
effect:
Increases your Maximum Health by 1000 and Disease Resistance by 2310.

Gain immunity to the Diseased status effect.

name: Arrow Barrage
effect: Launch a multitude of arrows into the sky to rain down, dealing 188 Physical Damage to enemies in the target area every 1 second for 8 seconds, after a 2 second delay.

name: Arrow Spray
effect: Fire a burst of arrows in one shot, dealing 683 Physical Damage to enemies in front of you.

name: Arterial Burst
effect:
Rend an enemy, dealing 849 Magic Damage.

Deals up to 33% more damage based on your missing Health.

If you use this ability while you are under 50% Health, it will always be a Critical Strike.

name: Ash Cloud
effect: Summon a scorching cloud of ash at the target location, reducing enemy Movement Speed by 70% and healing you and your allies for 139 every 1 second.

name: Ashlander
effect:
Increases your experience gain with the Dual Wield skill line by 15%.

Reduces your damage taken from environmental lava by 50%.

name: Aspect Improvement
effect: Allows the use of Legendary (gold) Aspect Runestones.

name: Aspect of Terror
effect: Summon a dark spirit to terrify up to 3 enemies, causing them to cower in fear for 2 seconds.

name: Assassin's Blade
effect: Thrust a magic blade with lethal precision to stab an enemy, dealing 410 Magic Damage. Deals 300% more damage to enemies below 25% Health.

name: Athletics
effect:
Increases the Movement Speed bonus of Sprint by 3% for each piece of Medium Armor equipped.

Current bonus: 0%.

Reduces the cost of Roll Dodge by 4% for each piece of Medium Armor equipped.

Current bonus: 0%.

name: Augur
effect:
Indicates how near the Antiquity is to the selected location. 

Can only be used a limited number of times, based on the Antiquity's Difficulty.

Works on the lowest six layers of dirt and rocks. Cannot detect Bonus Loot.

Using Augur does not consume a turn.

name: Aurora Javelin
effect:
Hurl your spear at an enemy with godlike strength, dealing 509 Magic Damage and knocking them back 8 meters.

This attack ignores the enemy's Resistances.

You deal 2% additional damage with the spear for every 1 meter you are away from the target, up to a maximum of 40%.

name: Avid Boneyard
effect:
Desecrate the ground at the target location, dealing 1265 Frost Damage over 10 seconds.

Consumes a corpse on cast to deal 50% more damage.

You or an ally standing in the graveyard can activate the Grave Robber synergy, dealing 1325 Frost Damage to enemies in the area and healing you for the damage done.

name: Backlash
effect:
Summon an expanding beam of pure sunlight to doom an enemy, dealing 410 Magic Damage to them and copying all their damage taken from you for 6 seconds and releasing 20% of it as additional Magic Damage to them.

Maximum copied damage: 4774.

name: Balance
effect:
Barter with Oblivion to trade vitality for power, sacrificing your Health in exchange for 3000 Magicka.

After the exchange is complete, you gain Major Resolve for 25 seconds, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5280.

The exchange reduces your Healing Done and damage shield strength by 50% for 4 seconds.

name: Balanced Blade
effect: Reduces the Stamina cost of your Two-Handed abilities by 15%.

name: Balanced Warrior
effect: Increases your Weapon Damage by 6% and Spell Resistance by 2640.

name: Ball of Lightning
effect:
Transform yourself into pure energy and flash forward.  After reaching your location, you become immune to snare and immobilize effects for 2 seconds. A ball of lightning is created at this location as well, which absorbs incoming projectiles for 3 seconds.

Casting again within 4 seconds costs 33% more Magicka.

name: Ballista
effect: Summon a turret to unleash a barrage of arrows at an enemy, dealing 6123 Physical Damage over 5 seconds.

name: Banish the Wicked
effect: You generate 9 Ultimate when you kill an Undead, Daedra or Werewolf.

name: Barbed Trap
effect:
Set a sharpened blade trap at your location, which takes 1.5 seconds to arm and lasts for 1 minute

When triggered, the trap deals 456 Physical Damage, an additional 1092 Physical Damage over 18 seconds, and grants you Minor Force, increasing your Critical Damage by 10% for the duration.

 Enemies who activate the trap are immobilized for 2 seconds.

name: Barrier
effect: Invoke defensive tactics to protect yourself and nearby group members with wards that each absorb up to 4562 damage for 30 seconds.

name: Battle Resurrection
effect: Reduces the time it takes you to resurrect another player by 30% while you are in a PvP area.

name: Battle Roar
effect: When you cast an Ultimate ability, you restore 46 Health, 46 Magicka, and 46 Stamina for each point of the Ultimate's cost.

name: Battle Rush
effect: Increases your Stamina Recovery by 30% for 10 seconds after killing a target.

name: Battlefield Mobility
effect:
Reduces the Movement Speed penalty of Bracing.

Current penalty: 36%

name: Beckoning Armor
effect:
Wrap yourself in hardened bone, granting you Major Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5280 for 20 seconds.  

While active, enemies that strike you with ranged attacks will be pulled toward you once every 3 seconds.

Creates a corpse when the effect completes.

name: Berserker Rage
effect:
Strike at an enemy with a vicious blow, dealing 1413 Physical Damage to them and all nearby enemies.

This attack ignores the target's Resistance and grants you Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance equal to the amount ignored from the initial target for 8 seconds.

You are immune to all disabling, snare, and immobilization effects for the duration.

name: Berserker Strike
effect:
Strike at an enemy with a vicious blow, dealing 1368 Physical Damage to them and all nearby enemies

This attack ignores the target's Physical Resistance, and grants you Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance equal to the amount ignored from the initial target for 8 seconds.

name: Betty Netch
effect:
Call a betty netch to your side, which grants you Major Brutality and Sorcery, increasing your Weapon Damage and Spell Damage by 20% for 22 seconds.

name: Binding Javelin
effect:
Hurl your spear at an enemy with godlike strength, dealing 547 Physical Damage and stunning them for 4 seconds.

This attack ignores the enemy's Resistances.

name: Bird of Prey

Invoke the spirit of agility to gain Major Expedition 6 seconds, increasing your Movement Speed by 30%.

While slotted gain Minor Berserk, increasing your damage done by 8%.

Launch a relentless assault, striking enemies in front of you four times with your Aedric spear. The spear deals 342 Physical Damage to the closest enemy and 131 Physical Damage to all other enemies.

Activating this ability grants you Major Savagery, increasing your Weapon Critical rating by 2191 for 8 seconds.

name: Bitter Harvest
effect:
Sap the lingering life from fresh corpses, granting you 2 Ultimate and healing 360 Health every 1 second for 2 seconds per corpse consumed.  This ability scales off of your Maximum Health.

While slotted, your damage taken is reduced by 3%.

name: Blade Cloak
effect:
Envelop yourself in a protective cloak of razors, gaining Major Evasion for 10 seconds, reducing damage from area attacks by 25%. 

Every 2 seconds the shrapnel will pulse, dealing 123 Physical Damage to all enemies within 5 meters.

name: Blade of Woe
effect:
Call the weapon of the Dark Brotherhood to your hand and deliver a killing blow to an unsuspecting target. Experience from this target is reduced by 75%.

This ability does not work on players or difficult targets.

name: Blastbones
effect:
Summon a flaming skeleton from the ground after 2.5 seconds. The skeleton runs after the target and explodes when it gets close to them, dealing 1232 Flame Damage to all enemies nearby.

name: Blazing Spear
effect:
Send your spear into the heavens to bring down a shower of divine wrath, dealing 763 Magic Damage to enemies in the area and an additional 75 Magic Damage every 1 second for 10 seconds.

An ally near the spear can activate the Blessed Shards synergy, restoring 3960 Magicka or Stamina, whichever maximum is higher.

name: Blessing of Protection
effect:
Slam your staff down to activate its blessings, healing you and your allies in front of you for 677 Health.

Also grants Minor Resolve, increasing you and your allies' Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 1320 for 8 seconds.

name: Blessing Of Restoration
effect:
Slam your staff down to activate its blessings, healing you and your allies in front of you for 933 Health.

Also grants Minor Resolve, increasing you and your allies' Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 1320 for 16 seconds.

name: Blighted Blastbones
effect:
Summon a decaying skeleton from the ground after 2.5 seconds. The skeleton runs after the target and explodes when it gets close to them, dealing 1413 Disease Damage to all enemies nearby and applying Major Defile to them for 4 seconds, reducing their healing received and Health Recovery by 30%

Creates a corpse on death.

name: Blinding Flare
effect: Launch a blinding flare, revealing stealthed and invisible enemies in the target area for 5 seconds.  Exposed enemies are stunned for 4 seconds, and cannot return to stealth or invisibility for 3 seconds.

name: Blood Altar
effect:
Sacrifice your life essence to conjure a fountain of blood to apply Minor Lifesteal to enemies in the area, healing you and your allies for 600 Health every 1 second when damaging them.

Allies in the area can activate the Blood Funnel synergy, healing for 40% of their Maximum Health.

name: Blood Craze
effect:
Slice an enemy with both weapons to cause deep lacerations, dealing 228 Physical Damage with each weapon and causing them to bleed for an additional 910 Physical Damage over 10 seconds.

name: Blood for Blood
effect:
Rend an enemy, dealing 822 Magic Damage.

Deals up to 75% more damage based on your missing Health.

After you cast this ability, you cannot be healed by allies for 5 seconds.

effect:
Allow your monstrous appetites to take hold, increasing your Weapon Damage and Spell Damage by 630.

While toggled on, the Health cost of this ability increases by 20% every second and you cannot be healed by anyone other than yourself.

name: Blood Magic

When you hit an enemy with a directly applied Dark Magic ability, you heal for 874.

name: Blood Mist

Dissolve into a bloody mist, reducing your damage taken by 75% for as long as you maintain the channel.

While in this form you deal 141 Magic Damage every 1 second to enemies around you and heal for the damage caused.

Entering this form removes and grants immunity to all disabling and immobilization effects, but you cannot be healed by any other ability and your Magicka Recovery is disabled.

name: Blood Rage
effect: When you deal damage, the duration of your Werewolf Transformation is increased by 4 seconds. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.

name: Blood Ritual
effect:
Allows you to infect another player with Noxiphilic Sanguivoria once every 7 days by returning to the Vampire ritual site. 

Players already infected with Lycanthropy cannot be infected with Noxiphilic Sanguivoria.

name: Blood Sacrifice
effect:
Sacrifice your own power to repair damaged flesh, healing you or an ally in front of you for 1273 Health but applying Minor Defile to yourself for 4 seconds, reducing your healing received and Health Recovery by 15%.

Consumes a corpse near you when cast to heal a second target.

name: Blood Scion
effect:
Transform into a monstrous creature of the night, instantly healing to full Health.

While transformed, your Maximum Health, Magicka, and Stamina are increased by 10000, you heal for 15% of all damage you deal, and you can see enemies through walls.

name: Bloodmoon
effect:
Allows you to infect another player with Lycanthropy once every 7 days by returning to the Werewolf ritual site. 

Players already infected with Noxiphilic Sanguivoria cannot be infected with Lycanthropy.

name: Bloodthirst
effect:
Flood an enemy with steel, battering them with five consecutive attacks that each deal 131 Physical Damage. 

The final hit deals 300% more damage and heals you for 63% of the damage caused.

name: Blue Betty
effect:
Call a betty netch to your side, which restores 4416 Magicka to you over 25 seconds and grants you Major Brutality and Sorcery, increasing your Weapon Damage and Spell Damage by 20%.

Every 5 seconds, the netch removes 1 negative effect from you.

name: Blur
effect: Surround yourself in a phantasmic aura to gain Major Evasion, decreasing damage from area attacks by 25% for 26 seconds.

name: Bolstering Darkness

Conjure a ring of shadow, reducing the Movement Speed of enemies by 70% and granting you and your allies Major Protection while inside the ring and even after leaving it, reducing your damage taken by 30%.

Allies in the area can activate the Hidden Refresh synergy, granting them invisibility, increasing their Movement Speed by 70%, and healing them for 3573 Health over 4 seconds.

name: Bolt Escape
effect:
Transform yourself into pure energy and flash forward, stunning enemies near your final location for 3 seconds. 

This effect cannot be blocked.

Casting again within 4 seconds costs 33% more Magicka.

name: Bombard
effect:
Fire a burst of arrows in one shot, dealing 684 Physical Damage to enemies in front of you. 

Enemies afflicted are immobilized and have their Movement Speed reduced by 40% for 4 seconds.

name: Bond With Nature
effect: Anytime one of your Animal Companion skills end, you are healed for 1260 Health.

name: Bone Armor
effect:
Wrap yourself in hardened bone, granting you Major Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5280 for 20 seconds.  

Creates a corpse when the effect completes.

Become a horrific Bone Goliath, increasing your Maximum Health by 30000 for 20 seconds and immediately restoring 30000 Health. 

While transformed, your damaging Light Attacks restore 174 Health and your fully charged Heavy Attacks restore 437 Health. This ability scales off your Maximum Health.

name: Bone Shield
effect:
Surround yourself with a whirlwind of bones, gaining a damage shield that absorbs up to 2709 damage for 6 seconds.  This ability scales off your Maximum Health.

An ally near you can activate the Bone Wall synergy, granting the ally and up to 5 other allies a damage shield equal to 30% of their Maximum Health 6 seconds.

name: Bone Surge
effect:
Surround yourself with a whirlwind of bones, gaining a damage shield that absorbs up to 2798 damage 6 seconds.  This ability scales off your Maximum Health.

An ally near you can activate the Spinal Surge synergy, granting the ally and up to 5 other allies a damage shield that absorbs up to 30% of their Maximum Health for 6 seconds and Major Vitality, increasing their healing received by 30%.

name: Bone Totem
effect:
Place a totem of bone at your feet that gives Minor Protection to you and your allies for 9 seconds, reducing your damage taken by 8%. 

After 2 seconds, the totem begins fearing nearby enemies every 2 seconds, causing them to cower in place for 4 seconds.

name: Boneyard
effect:

Consumes a corpse on cast to deal 50% more damage.

name: Borrowed Time

Enemies that are stunned gain 5000 Heal Absorption for 3 seconds, negating the next 5000 points of Healing Done.

name: Bound Aegis

Protect yourself with the power of Oblivion, creating a suit of Daedric mail that increases your block mitigation by 40% for 3 seconds.

While slotted, your Maximum Magicka is increased by 8% and you gain Minor Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 1320.

name: Bound Armaments

name: Bound Armor
effect:
Protect yourself with the power of Oblivion, creating a suit of Daedric mail that increases your block mitigation by 36% for 3 seconds.

While slotted, your Maximum Magicka is increased by 5%

Manifest yourself as pure lightning, zapping nearby enemies with electricity dealing 84 Shock Damage every 1 second for 23 seconds.

While in this form you also gain Major Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5280.

Activating this grants Major Expedition for a brief period, increasing your Movement Speed 30% for 4 seconds.

name: Bounty Hunter
effect: Allows you to accept bounty quests from the Fighters Guild in Cyrodiil.

name: Braided Tether
effect:
Siphon the last remnants of life from a corpse, healing for 2124 Health over 12 seconds to yourself, all allies around you, and all allies between you and the corpse.  This ability scales off your highest offensive stats.

While slotted, your Healing Done is increased by 3%.

name: Brawler
effect:
Focus your strength into a mighty swing, dealing 684 Physical Damage to enemies in front of you.

You also gain a damage shield that absorbs 638 damage for 6 seconds. Each enemy hit increases the damage shield's strength by 50%, up to 300%.

name: Brawny
effect: Increases your Maximum Stamina by 2000.

name: Breath of Life
effect:
Beacon your inner light, healing yourself or a wounded ally in front of you for 1233 Health.

Also heals one other injured target for 424 Health.

name: Brewer
effect: Creates 3 extra servings for each drink recipe made.

name: Brutal Pounce

Pounce on an enemy with primal fury, dealing 706 Physical Damage to them and to other nearby enemies.

Activating the ability again within the next 5 seconds causes you to cast Brutal Carnage.

Brutal Carnage causes the enemies to bleed for 492 Physical Damage over 10 seconds and deals up to 450% more damage to enemies under 100% Health.  Increases your Weapon Damage by 100 for each enemy hit, up to a maximum of 6 times.

name: Budding Seeds

Summon a field of flowers which blooms after 6 seconds, healing you and allies in the area for 1233 Health.

An ally within the field can activate the Harvest synergy, healing for 1320 Health over 5 seconds.

name: Bull Netch
effect:

Every 5 seconds, the netch removes 1 negative effect from you.

name: Capacitor
effect: Increases your Magicka Recovery by 10%.

effect: Reduces research times by 25%, limits research time to 30 days, and allows the research of three items at once.

name: Carve
effect: Focus your strength into a mighty swing, dealing 684 Physical Damage to enemies in front of you, and causing them to bleed for an additional 700 Physical Damage over 10 seconds.

name: Catalyst
effect: After drinking a potion you gain 20 Ultimate.

effect: Bend time and space around you to gain Major Expedition for 12 seconds and Minor Force for 36 seconds, increasing your Movement Speed by 30% and Critical Damage by 10%.

effect: Creates 3 extra servings for each food recipe made.

effect: Produces 3 extra potions or 12 extra poisons per crafting attempt.

name: Cinder Storm
effect: Summon a scorching cloud of ash at the target location, reducing enemy Movement Speed by 70% and healing you and your allies for 215 every 1 second.

name: Circle of Protection
effect: Brand the earth at your location with a rune of protection for 20 seconds. You and your allies in the area gain Minor Protection and Minor Endurance, reducing your damage taken by 8% and increasing your Stamina Recovery by 10%.

name: Clairvoyance
effect: Reduces the cost of your Psijic Order abilities by 15%.

name: Claws of Anguish

name: Claws of Life

This ability scales with your highest offensive stats.

name: Cleave

name: Clemency
effect: When a guard accosts you, you may use Clemency once per day. If used, the Guard will not arrest you or take your money and stolen goods. Additionally, Guards will not attempt to accost you for  1 minute after you use Clemency unless you commit other crimes.

name: Coagulating Blood

effect: You generate 20 Ultimate when you kill an enemy player.

effect: Increases your Healing Done by 20% when you are near a Keep.

effect:

name: Combustion

name: Shuffle
effect:
Shroud yourself in mist to gain Major Evasion, decreasing damage from area attacks by 25% for 20 seconds.

Each piece of Medium Armor worn removes and grants immunity to snares and immobilizations for 1 second.

name: Siege Shield
effect: Create a protective sphere over your location that reduces damage from siege weapons by 50%.

name: Siege Weapon Shield
effect:
Create a protective sphere over your location that reduces damage from siege weapons to you and your allies by 50%.

The sphere also protects you and your allies' siege weapons, reducing damage from enemy siege weapons by 75%.

name: Silver Bolts
effect: Fire a Dawnguard Vampire Hunter's crossbow bolt to strike an enemy, dealing 821 Physical Damage.

name: Silver Leash
effect: Fire a Dawnguard's crossbow hook to pull an enemy to you, dealing 565 Physical Damage, and reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.

name: Silver Shards
effect:
Fire an augmented Dawnguard Vampire Hunter's crossbow bolt to strike an enemy, dealing 821 Physical Damage.

Fires additional bolts at other enemies near the initial target for 22% less damage.

name: Simmering Frenzy
effect:
Allow your monstrous appetites to take hold, increasing your Weapon Damage and Spell Damage by 660.

While toggled on, the Health cost of this ability increases by 20% and Weapon Damage and Spell Damage bonus increases by 10% every second. You also cannot be healed by anyone other than yourself.

name: Siphon Spirit
effect:
Focus your staff's power to apply Minor Lifesteal to an enemy for 30 seconds, healing you and your allies for 600 Health every 1 second when damaging them.

Also applies Minor Magickasteal to the enemy for 30 seconds, causing you and your allies to restore 300 Magicka every 1 second when damaging them.

name: Siphoning Attacks
effect:
Imbue your weapons with soul-stealing power, causing your Light and Heavy Attacks to heal you for 1452 Health and restore 106 Magicka for 20 seconds. Fully charged Heavy Attacks restore twice the value.

You restore up to 4270 additional Magicka when the effect ends, based on the length of time Siphoning Attacks was active.

name: Siphoning Strikes
effect: Imbue your weapons with soul-stealing power, causing your Light and Heavy Attacks to heal you for 1438 Health for 20 seconds. Fully charged Heavy Attacks restore twice the value.

name: Skeletal Arcanist
effect:
Unearth a skeletal mage from the dirt to fight by your side for 16 seconds. The mage attacks the closest enemy every 2 seconds, dealing 290 Shock Damage to them and all other enemies nearby.

Creates a corpse on death.

name: Skeletal Archer
effect:
Unearth a skeletal archer from the dirt to fight by your side for 16 seconds. The archer attacks the closest enemy every 2 seconds, dealing 312 Physical Damage.

Each time the archer deals damage, its next attack will do 5% more damage than the previous attack.

Creates a corpse on death.

name: Skeletal Mage
effect:
Unearth a skeletal mage from the dirt to fight by your side for 16 seconds. The mage attacks the closest enemy every 2 seconds, dealing 280 Shock Damage.

Creates a corpse on death.

name: Skilled Tracker
effect: Your Fighters Guild abilities deal an additional 20% damage to Undead, Daedra and Werewolves.

name: Slaughter
effect: Increases damage with Dual Wield abilities by 20% against enemies with under 25% Health.

name: Slayer
effect:
Increases your Weapon Damage by 3% for each Fighters Guild ability slotted.

Current bonus: 0%.

name: Sleet Storm
effect:
Twist a violent storm around you, dealing 455 Frost Damage every 1 second for 8 seconds to enemies around you and reducing their Movement Speed by 40%.  

You and nearby allies gain Major Protection, reducing your damage taken by 30%.

name: Snakeblood
effect: Reduces duration of negative effects in potions by 100% when consumed.

name: Snipe
effect: Plant a masterfully aimed arrow in an enemy's vital spot, dealing 1195 Physical Damage.

name: Solar Barrage
effect:
Conjure solar energy to blast enemies around you, dealing 203 Magic Damage every 2 seconds for 8 seconds.

While this ability is active you gain Empower, increasing the damage of your Light Attacks by 40%.

name: Solar Disturbance
effect:
Call down a fragment of the sun, dealing 471 Magic Damage every 1 second for 8 seconds to enemies in the area. Also applies Major Maim, reducing enemy damage done by 30%. Major Maim persists on enemies who leave the Nova for 4 seconds.

An ally near the fragment can activate the Supernova synergy, dealing 1023 Magic Damage to all enemies in the area and stunning them for 2.5 seconds.

name: Solar Flare
effect:
Conjure a ball of solar energy to heave at an enemy, dealing 1076 Magic Damage.

Also grants you Empower for 5 seconds, increasing the damage of your next Light Attack by 40%.

name: Solar Prison
effect:
Call down a fragment of the sun, dealing 471 Magic Damage every 1 second for 8 seconds to enemies in the area and afflicting them with Major Maim, reducing their damage done by 30%.

An ally near the fragment can activate the Gravity Crush synergy, dealing 1791 Magic Damage to all enemies in the area and stunning them for 5 seconds.

name: Solvent Proficiency
effect: Allows the Alchemist to use Lorkhan's Tears and Alkahest to make Champion 150 potions and poisons.

name: Soothing Spores
effect:
Seed a large area of mushrooms in front of you, healing you and your allies for 942 Health.

Heals for 15% more on allies that are within 8 meters of you.

name: Soul Assault
effect:
Burn an enemy from the inside with soulfire, dealing 8000 Magic Damage over 6 seconds.

While channeling this ability, you gain immunity to all disabling effects.

Enemies affected by this ability are revealed for 3 seconds and may not enter stealth or invisibility.

name: Soul Harvest
effect:
Ravage an enemy with a spinning attack, dealing 1460 Magic Damage and increasing your damage against them by 20% for 6 seconds.

Also afflicts the enemy with Major Defile, reducing their healing received and Health Recovery by 30%.

While slotted, any time you kill an enemy you gain 10 Ultimate.

name: Soul Lock
effect: Killing an enemy with a Weapon ability has a 10% chance of automatically filling an empty Soul Gem.

name: Soul Shatter
effect:
When your Health drops below 20% your soul explodes, dealing 874 Magic Damage to enemies within 8 meters of you.

This effect can occur once every 2 minutes.

name: Soul Shred
effect:
Ravage nearby enemies' souls with a night rune, dealing 1368 Magic Damage and stunning them for 4 seconds. 

An ally can target a ravaged enemy and activate the Soul Leech synergy, dealing 1226 Magic Damage to them and healing for the damage caused.

name: Soul Siphon
effect:
Sanctify your soul and the souls of nearby allies with a night rune, healing for 1413 Health and an additional 3680 Health over 4 seconds.

You and your allies will also receive Major Vitality, increasing your healing received by 30% for 4 seconds.

An ally can target a nearby enemy and activate the Soul Leech synergy, dealing 1226 Magic Damage to them and healing for the damage caused.

name: Soul Siphoner
effect:
Increases your Healing Done by 3% for each Siphoning ability slotted. 

Current bonus: 0%.

name: Soul Splitting Trap
effect:
Lay claim to enemy souls, dealing 822 Magic Damage or 912 Physical Damage to the target and any other nearby enemies over 10 seconds.  The damage dealt is based on your highest offensive stats.

Fills an empty Soul Gem if an affected enemy dies.

name: Soul Strike
effect:
Burn an enemy from the inside with soulfire, dealing 5808 Magic Damage over 5 seconds.

While channeling this ability, you gain immunity to all disabling effects.

Enemies affected by this ability are revealed for 3 seconds and may not enter stealth or invisibility.

name: Soul Summons
effect: Allows you to revive once every 1 hour without spending a Soul Gem.

name: Soul Tether
effect:
Ravage nearby enemies' souls with a night rune, dealing 1413 Magic Damage, healing for half the damage, and stunning them for 4 seconds. 

Ravaged enemies are tethered to you for 8 seconds, and while they remain within 10 meters, you siphon 245 Health from them every second.

An ally can target a ravaged enemy and activate the Soul Leech synergy, dealing 1226 Magic Damage to them and healing for the damage caused.

name: Soul Trap
effect:
Lay claim to an enemy's soul, dealing 1224 Magic Damage or 1362 Physical Damage over 10 seconds.  The damage dealt is based on your highest offensive stats.

Fills an empty Soul Gem if an affected enemy dies.

name: Spear Shards
effect:
Send your spear into the heavens to bring down a shower of divine wrath, dealing 615 Magic Damage to enemies in the area and an additional 60 Magic Damage every 1 second for 10 seconds.

An ally near the spear can activate the Blessed Shards synergy, restoring 3960 Magicka or Stamina, whichever maximum is higher.

name: Spear Wall
effect: Gain Minor Protection for 6 seconds, reducing damage taken by 8%.

name: Spectral Assassin
effect: 15% chance to shroud you when using the Blade of Woe, shielding you from being witnessed and receiving a Bounty.

name: Spell Attunement
effect:
Increases your Spell Resistance by 2310.  This effect is doubled if you are afflicted with Burning, Chilled, or Concussed.  

Increases your Magicka Recovery by 100.

name: Spell Orb
effect:
When you cast a Psijic Order ability while you are in combat, you generate a spell charge. When you reach 5 spell charges, you launch a spell orb at the closest enemy to you dealing 397 Magic Damage or 441 Physical Damage, whichever is higher.

The spell charges must be generated within 10 seconds of each other or all charges will be lost.

name: Spell Recharge
effect:
When you activate a class ability, you restore 640 Magicka or Stamina, based on whichever is lowest.  This effect can occur once every 6 seconds.

When you are using an ability with a channel or cast time, you take 5% less damage.

name: Spell Symmetry
effect:
Barter with Oblivion to trade vitality for power, sacrificing your Health in exchange for 3000 Magicka.

After the exchange is complete, the cost of your next Magicka Ability is reduced by 33% for 5 seconds.

The exchange reduces your Healing Done and damage shield strength by 50% for 4 seconds.

name: Spell Wall
effect: Reinforce your shield, allowing you to automatically block all attacks at no cost and reflect all projectiles cast at you for 7 seconds.

name: Spell Warding
effect:
Increases your Spell Resistance by 363 for each piece of Light Armor equipped. 

Current bonus: 0.

name: Spiked Armor
effect:
Release your inner Dragon to gain Major Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5280 for 20 seconds.  

While active, the armor returns 143 Magic Damage to any enemy that uses a direct damage attack against you in melee range.

name: Spiked Bone Shield
effect:
Surround yourself with a whirlwind of bones, gaining a damage shield that absorbs up to 2709 damage for 6 seconds and returns 100% of direct damage absorbed back to the enemy.  This ability scales off your Maximum Health.

An ally near you can activate the Bone Wall synergy, granting the ally and up to 5 other allies a damage shield equal to 30% of their Maximum Health 6 seconds.

name: Spirit Guardian
effect:
Conjure a ghostly spirit to do your bidding and stay by your side for 16 seconds. The spirit heals you or the lowest Health ally around you every 2 seconds, restoring 484 Health.

While active, 10% of the damage you take is transferred to the spirit instead.

Creates a corpse on death.

name: Spirit Mender
effect:
Conjure a ghostly spirit to do your bidding and stay by your side for 16 seconds. The spirit heals you or the lowest Health ally around you every 2 seconds, restoring 468 Health.

Creates a corpse on death.

name: Stalking Blastbones
effect:
Summon a flaming skeleton from the ground after 2.5 seconds. The skeleton runs after the target and explodes when it gets close to them, dealing 1273 Flame Damage to all enemies nearby.

Every second the skeleton spends chasing its target increases the damage of the explosion by 10%, up to a maximum of 50% more damage.

Creates a corpse on death.

name: Stalwart
effect:
Increases your Maximum Stamina by 1500.

When you take damage, you gain 5 Ultimate.  This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.

name: Stalwart Guard
effect:
Create a lifebond between you and an allied player. While bonded, 30% of the damage they take is instead redistributed to you.

You and your bonded ally also gain Minor Force, increasing your Critical Damage by 10%.

The bond will remain until you recast the spell or move more than 15 meters away from your ally.

name: Stampede
effect:
Launch across the earth and smash an enemy, dealing 565 Physical Damage to them and all nearby enemies.  This attack is always a Critical Strike.

After reaching your target, you sunder the ground beneath you, dealing 84 Physical Damage to all enemies in the area every 1 second for 10 seconds.

name: Standard of Might
effect:
Call down a battle standard, dealing 342 Flame Damage every 1 second for 16 seconds to enemies and applying Major Defile to them, reducing their healing received and Health Recovery by 30%. 

Standing in the area increases your damage done and reduces damage taken by 15%.

An ally near the standard can activate the Shackle synergy, dealing 1060 Flame Damage to enemies in the area and immobilizing them for 5 seconds.

name: Steadfast Ward
effect:
Call on your staff's strength to protect you or the lowest health ally around you with a damage shield that absorbs 821 damage.

The shield's strength is increased by up to 100%, depending on the severity of the target's wounds.

name: Steel Tornado
effect: Launch yourself into a lethal spin, releasing a flurry of blades around you that deals 684 Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

name: Stitching
effect: Reduces research times by 25%, limits research time to 30 days, and allows the research of three items at once.

name: Stone Giant
effect:
Crush the earth beneath you, dealing 912 Physical Damage to all enemies within 6 meters of you. Debris ripped from the ground is held around you for 10 seconds.

Activating the ability again allows you to launch part of the debris at an enemy, dealing 912 Physical Damage, up to 3 times. The final cast stuns for 2.5 seconds.

Each hit applies Stagger, increasing damage taken by 65 per stack for 5 seconds.

name: Stonefist
effect:
Crush the earth beneath you, dealing 912 Physical Damage to all enemies within 6 meters of you. Debris ripped from the ground is held around you for 10 seconds.

Activating the ability again allows you to launch part of the debris at an enemy, dealing 912 Physical Damage, up to 3 times. The final cast stuns enemies hit for 2.5 seconds.

name: Streak
effect:
Transform yourself into pure energy and flash forward, dealing 565 Shock Damage to enemies in your wake and stunning them for 3 seconds.

This effect cannot be blocked.

Casting again within 4 seconds costs 33% more Magicka.

This ability scales with your highest offensive stats.

name: Strife
effect: Steal an enemy's life force, dealing 513 Magic Damage and healing you or a nearby ally for 50% of the damage inflicted every 2 seconds for 10 seconds.

name: Strike from the Shadows
effect: When you leave Sneak, invisibility, or Mist Form your Weapon Damage and Spell Damage is increased by 300 for 6 seconds.

name: Structured Entropy
effect: Bind an enemy with chaotic magic, dealing 1230 Magic Damage over 10 seconds, and healing you for 141 every 2 seconds.

name: Stupefy
effect:
Subdue enemies in front of you with your baleful gaze, stunning them for 5 seconds if they are facing your direction.

This stun cannot be blocked.

After the stun ends they remain stupefied, reducing their Movement Speed by 53% for 5 seconds.

name: Sturdy Horn
effect:
Sound a war horn to rally your forces, increasing you and your group's Maximum Magicka and Maximum Stamina by 10% for 30 seconds.

You and your allies gain 990 Critical Resistance for 10 seconds, reducing incoming critical damage by 15%.

name: Subterranean Assault
effect:
Stir a group of shalk that attack after 3 seconds, dealing 1272 Poison Damage to enemies in front of you.

Enemies damaged are afflicted with Major Fracture, reducing their Physical Resistance by 5280 for 6 seconds.

name: Summon Charged Atronach
effect:
Summon an immobile storm atronach at the target location. Its arrival deals 912 Shock Damage and stuns enemies for 3 seconds. The atronach zaps the closest enemy, dealing 441 Shock Damage every 1 second, and periodically deals 912 Shock Damage to enemies around it.

An ally near the atronach can activate the Charged Lightning synergy, granting the ally and the atronach Major Berserk, increasing their damage done by 25% for 8 seconds.

name: Summon Shade
effect:
Summon a shade version of yourself to attack an enemy and fight at your side for 15 seconds. 

The shade slashes at an enemy, dealing 157 Magic Damage. The shade's attacks inflict Minor Maim, reducing the enemy's damage done by 15% for 4 seconds.

This ability scales with your highest offensive stats.

name: Summon Storm Atronach
effect:
Summon an immobile storm atronach at the target location. Its arrival deals 883 Shock Damage and stuns enemies for 3 seconds. The atronach zaps the closest enemy, dealing 441 Shock Damage every 1 second.

An ally near the atronach can activate the Charged Lightning synergy, granting the ally and the atronach Major Berserk, increasing their damage done by 25% for 8 seconds.

name: Summon Twilight Matriarch
effect:
Call on Azura to send a twilight matriarch to fight at your side. The twilight matriarch's zaps deal 123 Shock Damage and its kicks deal 123 Shock Damage.

Once summoned, you can activate the twilight matriarch's special ability for 4590 Magicka, causing it to heal 2 friendly targets for 1273 and itself for 636.

The twilight matriarch remains until killed or unsummoned.

name: Summon Twilight Tormentor
effect:
Call on Azura to send a twilight tormentor to fight at your side. The twilight tormentor's zaps deal 254 Shock Damage and its kicks deal 254 Shock Damage.

Once summoned, you can activate the twilight tormentor's special ability for 2970 Magicka, causing it to deal 53% more damage to enemies above 50% Health for 15 seconds.

The twilight tormentor remains until killed or unsummoned.

name: Summon Unstable Clannfear
effect:
Command the powers of Oblivion to send a Daedric clannfear to fight at your side. The clannfear's headbutt deals 140 Physical Damage, while its tail spike hits nearby enemies for 140 Physical Damage after 1 second.  

Once summoned, you can activate the clannfear's special ability for 4500 Magicka, healing you for 2798 and the clannfear for 1398.

The clannfear remains until killed or unsummoned.

name: Summon Unstable Familiar
effect:
Command the powers of Oblivion to send a Daedric familiar to fight at your side. The familiar's attacks deal 122 Shock Damage.

Once summoned, you can activate the familiar's special ability for 3510 Magicka, dealing 204 Shock Damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds to enemies near him.

The familiar remains until killed or unsummoned.

name: Summon Volatile Familiar
effect:
Command the powers of Oblivion to send a Daedric familiar to fight at your side. The familiar's attacks deal 127 Shock Damage.

Once summoned, you can activate the familiar's special ability for 3510 Magicka, dealing 211 Shock Damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds to enemies near him. The final pulse will stun all enemies hit for 3 seconds.

The familiar remains until killed or unsummoned.

name: Summon Winged Twilight
effect:
Call on Azura to send a winged twilight to fight at your side. The winged twilight's zaps deal 122 Shock Damage and its kicks deal 122 Shock Damage.

Once summoned, you can activate the winged twilight's special ability for 4590 Magicka, causing it to heal a friendly target for 1232 and itself for 615.

The winged twilight remains until killed or unsummoned.

name: Summoner's Armor
effect:
Wrap yourself in hardened bone, granting you Major Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5280 for 20 seconds.  

While active, reduce the cost of Blastbones, Skeletal Mage, and Spirit Mender by 15%.

Creates a corpse when the effect completes.

name: Sun Fire
effect:
Blast an enemy with a charge of radiant heat, dealing 410 Flame Damage, and an additional 820 Flame Damage over 10 seconds.

Upon activation you gain Major Prophecy, increasing your Spell Critical rating by 2191.

name: Sun Shield
effect:
Surround yourself with solar rays, granting a damage shield that absorbs up to 2623 damage for 6 seconds.  This portion of the ability scales off your Maximum Health.

Nearby enemies take 615 Magic Damage when the shield is activated, and each enemy hit increases the shield's strength by 4%.

name: Sundering Swing
effect: Smash Volendrung into a structure, dealing 15960 Phyiscal Damage every 0.8 seconds for 3 seconds.

name: Suppression Field
effect:
Create a globe of magic suppression for 12 seconds, removing and preventing all enemy area of effect abilities from occurring in the area.

Enemies within the globe are stunned, while enemy players will be silenced rather than stunned.

The globe also damages enemies for 204 Magic Damage every 0.5 seconds.

name: Surge
effect:
Invoke Meridia's name to gain Major Brutality and Sorcery, increasing your Weapon Damage and Spell Damage by 20% for 33 seconds.

While active, dealing Critical Damage heals you for 2550 Health. This effect can occur once every 1 second.

name: Surprise Attack
effect:
Slash an enemy, dealing 912 Physical Damage.  If you are flanking the enemy, shred through a small portion of their armor, reducing their Physical Resistance by 5% for 8 seconds.

Attacking with Surprise Attack from the flank stuns the enemy for 3 seconds and sets them Off Balance.

name: Swallow Soul
effect: Steal an enemy's life force, dealing 763 Magic Damage and healing you for 35% of the damage inflicted every 2 seconds for 10 seconds.

name: Swarm
effect:
Unleash a swarm of fetcherflies to relentlessly attack an enemy, dealing 1224 Magic Damage over 10 seconds.  

The fetcherflies rip through the enemy's flesh, afflicting them with Minor Vulnerability for the duration, increasing their damage taken by 8%.

name: Swarming Scion
effect:
Transform into a monstrous creature of the night, instantly healing to full Health.

While transformed, your Maximum Health, Magicka, and Stamina are increased by 10000, you heal for 15% of all damage you deal, and you can see enemies through walls. 

Bats also swarm around you and shred enemies that come close, dealing 341 Magic Damage every 1 second.

name: Swift Warrior
effect:
Increases your Weapon Damage by 258.

Reduces the cost of Sprint by 12% and increases the Movement Speed bonus of Sprint by 10%.

name: Swiftly Forgotten
effect:
Bounty is decreased by 115 after 3 minutes.
Heat is decreased by 64 after 3 seconds.

name: Sword and Board
effect: Increases your Weapon Damage by 5% and the amount of damage you can block by 20%.

name: Symbiosis
effect:
Invoke the Rites of Moawita, replacing your Light and Heavy Attacks with healing abilities that can be used on allies.

Your Light Attacks heal for 381.

Your Heavy Attacks heal for 338 every 1 second, and restore 1155 Magicka to you for successfully healing.

You heal yourself for 50% of the amount of Healing Done to the ally.

name: Syrabane's Boon
effect: Increases your Maximum Magicka by 2000.

name: Tailoring
effect: Allows the use of Void Cloth and Shadowhide.

name: Take Flight
effect: Launch yourself at an enemy, dealing 1916 Physical Damage to all enemies in the area, knocking them back, and stunning them for 2 seconds.

name: Tangling Webs
effect:
Hurl webs to ensnare your foes, reducing the Movement Speed of enemies in the area by 50% and dealing 684 Physical Damage. After 10 seconds the webs explode, dealing 912 Poison Damage to enemies within.

A ranged ally can activate the Arachnophobia synergy, dealing 883 Poison Damage to them, fearing them for 4 seconds, and summoning a spider to attack for 10 seconds. The spider bites enemies for 265 Physical Damage.

name: Tannin Expertise
effect: More than doubles the chances to improve items with tannins.

name: Teleport Strike
effect: Flash through the shadows and ambush an enemy, dealing 492 Magic Damage and afflicting them with Minor Vulnerability for 10 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 8%.

name: Temper Expertise
effect: More than doubles the chances to improve items with tempers.

name: Temporal Guard
effect:
Step backwards in time, resetting your Health, Magicka, Stamina, and position to what they were 4 seconds ago.

While slotted you gain Minor Protection, reducing your damage taken by 8%.

name: Thrive in Chaos
effect:
Slash enemies in front of you, causing them to bleed for 2735 Physical Damage over 8 seconds and healing you for 50% of the damage done.

Each enemy hit increases your damage done by 6% for the duration.  This effect can stack up to 6 times.

name: Time Freeze
effect: Freeze the passage of time at the target location, gradually reducing the Movement Speed of enemies in the area over 4 seconds before finally stunning them in place for 3 seconds when the duration completes.

name: Time Stop
effect: Freeze the passage of time at the target location, gradually reducing the Movement Speed of enemies in the area during the channel before finally stunning them in place for 3 seconds when the channel completes.

name: Timely Escape
effect: When you have Bounty and are in combat, you have a chance to spot a "Footpad" in a town with a Refuge. Interacting with the Footpad will transport the player safely into the nearest Refuge.

name: Toppling Charge
effect:
Charge with your divine lance to impale an enemy, dealing 509 Magic Damage, stunning them for 3 seconds, and setting them Off Balance.

Interrupts the target if they were casting.

name: Tough
effect: Increases your Maximum Health by 2000.

name: Toxic Barrage
effect:
Unleash a barrage of arrows at an enemy, dealing 6840 Poison Damage over 4 seconds. 

After dealing damage you poison the enemy, dealing an additional 3530 Poison Damage over 8 seconds after a 1 second delay.

You can move at full speed and are immune to all disabling effects while channeling this attack.

name: Trafficker
effect: Increases the number of fence interactions you can use each day by 180%.

name: Transfer
effect: Casting a Siphoning ability while in combat generates 2 Ultimate. This effect can occur once every 4 seconds.

name: Trap Beast
effect:
Set a sharpened blade trap at your location, which takes 1.5 seconds to arm and lasts for 1 minute. 

When triggered, the trap deals 455 Physical Damage, an additional 905 Physical Damage over 10 seconds, and grants you Minor Force, increasing your Critical Damage by 10% for the duration.

Enemies who activate the trap are immobilized for 2 seconds.

name: Trapping Webs
effect:
Hurl webs to ensnare your foes, reducing the Movement Speed of enemies in the area by 50% and dealing 683 Physical Damage.  After 10 seconds the webs explode, dealing 912 Poison Damage to enemies within.

A ranged ally can activate the Spawn Broodlings synergy, dealing 883 Poison Damage to them and summoning a spider to attack for 10 seconds. The spider bites enemies for 265 Physical Damage.

name: Tri Focus
effect:
Fully-charged Flame Staff Heavy Attacks deal 12% additional damage.

Shock Staff Heavy Attacks damage nearby enemies for 100% of the damage done.

Fully-charged Frost Staff Heavy Attacks taunt the enemy to attack you for 15 seconds and grant a damage shield that absorbs 699 damage. 

While a Frost Staff is equipped, blocking costs Magicka instead of Stamina.

name: Trowel
effect:
Removes 3 layers of dirt or rock from a 1x1 area.

Costs |c19D3FF2 Intuition to use.
Can safely trigger Fissures to create explosive chain reactions.

name: Turn Evil
effect:
Brand the earth at your location with a rune of protection for 20 seconds. You and your allies in the area gain Minor Protection and Minor Endurance, reducing your damage taken by 8% and increasing your Stamina Recovery by 10%.

Upon activation, enemies in the area are feared for 5 seconds.

name: Twin Blade and Blunt
effect:
Grants a bonus based on the type of weapon equipped:

Each axe gives your melee attacks an 8% chance to bleed enemies for 1176 Physical Damage over 6 seconds.

Each mace causes your attacks to ignore 10% of an enemy's Physical Resistance. 

Each sword increases your damage done by 3%.

Each dagger increases your Weapon Critical rating. Current bonus: 0.

name: Twin Slashes
effect: Slice an enemy with both weapons to cause deep lacerations, dealing 227 Physical Damage with each weapon and causing them to bleed for an additional 905 Physical Damage over 10 seconds.

name: Twisting Path
effect:
Create a corridor of shadows, granting you and allies in area Major Expedition, increasing movement speed by 30%. Effect persists for 4 seconds after leaving the path.

Deals 216 Magic Damage to enemies in the target area every 1 second.

name: Undaunted Command
effect:
Activating an ally's synergy restores 4% of your Maximum Health, Stamina, and Magicka.

Current Bonus: 349 Health, 353 Stamina, and 318 Magicka.

name: Undaunted Mettle
effect:
Increases your Maximum Health, Stamina, and Magicka by 2% per type of Armor (Heavy, Medium, Light) that you have equipped. 

Current bonus: 0%.

name: Undead Confederate
effect: While you have a Blastbones, Skeletal Mage, or Spirit Mender active, your Magicka and Stamina Recovery is increased by 200.

name: Undeath
effect: Reduces your damage taken by up to 30% based on your missing Health.

name: Undo
effect: Step backwards in time, resetting your Health, Magicka, Stamina, and position to what they were 4 seconds ago.

name: Unflinching Rage
effect:
Increases your Maximum Health by 1000.

When you deal damage with a Weapon ability, you heal for 600 Health.  This can occur once every 4 seconds.

name: Unholy Knowledge
effect: Reduces the Health, Magicka, and Stamina costs of your abilities by 6%.

name: Unnatural Movement
effect:
Reduces the cost of Sprint by 50%.

If you continuously Sprint for 3 seconds you automatically become invisible.

name: Unnerving Boneyard
effect:
Desecrate the ground at the target location, dealing 1265 Frost Damage over 10 seconds and applying Major Breach and Fracture to enemies within, reducing their Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5280.

Consumes a corpse on cast to deal 50% more damage.

An ally standing in the graveyard can activate the Grave Robber synergy, dealing 1325 Frost Damage to enemies in the area and healing you for the damage done.

name: Unraveling
effect: Maximizes the chances of extracting Clothing ingredients and allows the refining of the most powerful tannins from raw materials.

name: Unrelenting Grip
effect:
Launch a fiery chain to grasp and pull an enemy to you, dealing 509 Flame Damage.

Grants Major Expedition, increasing your Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.

If the target cannot be pulled, you restore 100% of the ability's cost as Magicka.

This attack cannot be dodged or reflected.

name: Unstable Core
effect:
Envelop an enemy in a lightless sphere for 4 seconds, that harms them with growing intensity anytime they use a Direct Damage attack.  Limited to one.

Their first attack reduces their movement speed by 30% for 4 seconds and deals 159 Magic Damage, their second attack immobilizes them for 3 seconds and deals 318 Magic Damage, and their third attack stuns them for 3 seconds and deals 636 Magic Damage.  The effects can activate once every 1 second.

name: Unstable Wall of Elements
effect:
Create an unstable elemental barrier in front of you, dealing 112 Magic Damage to enemies in the target area every 1 second before exploding for an additional 636 Magic Damage.

Unstable Wall of Fire deals additional damage to Burning enemies.

Unstable Wall of Frost reduces enemy Movement Speed and immobilizes Chilled enemies.

Unstable Wall of Storms sets Concussed enemies Off Balance.

name: Unstoppable
effect:
Intensify your physical presence to gain Major Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5280 for 20 seconds.

Also grants you immunity to knockback and disabling effects for 6 seconds, but reduces your Movement Speed by 65% for the duration.

name: Unstoppable Brute
effect:
Intensify your physical presence to gain Major Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5280 for 20 seconds.  

While this effect persists, each piece of Heavy Armor worn decreases the cost of Break Free by 5%.

Also grants you immunity to knockback and disabling effects for 6 seconds, but reduces your Movement Speed by 65% for the duration.

name: Uppercut
effect: Slam an enemy with an upward swing, dealing 1049 Physical Damage.

name: Vampire's Bane
effect:
Blast an enemy with a charge of radiant heat, dealing 411 Flame Damage, and an additional 1183 Flame Damage over 14 seconds.

Upon activation you gain Major Prophecy, increasing your Spell Critical rating by 2191.

name: Vampiric Drain
effect: Siphon away your enemies' vitality, dealing 204 Magic Damage and healing you for 23% of your missing Health every 1 second for 3 seconds.

name: Veil of Blades
effect:
Conjure a ring of shadow, reducing the Movement Speed of enemies by 70%, dealing 423 Magic Damage to them every 1 second, and granting you and your allies Major Protection, reducing your damage taken by 30%. 

Allies in the area can activate the Hidden Refresh synergy, granting them invisibility, increasing their Movement Speed by 70%, and healing them for 3573 Health over 4 seconds.

name: Veil of Shadows
effect: Decreases detection range of Witnesses and Guards by 10%. Witnesses and Guards are thus less likely to notice criminal actions, though this has no impact on the range from which Guards will accost you.

name: Veiled Strike
effect:
Slash an enemy, dealing 821 Magic Damage. 

Attacking with Veiled Strike from the flank stuns the enemy for 3 seconds and sets them Off Balance.

name: Venom Arrow
effect:
Shoot an arrow coated in Shadowscale poison at an enemy, dealing 456 Poison Damage and an additional 910 Poison Damage over 10 seconds.

If the enemy hit is casting an ability they are interrupted, set Off Balance, and stunned for 3 seconds.

name: Venom Skull
effect:
Lob an explosive skull at an enemy, dealing 848 Poison Damage.

Every third cast of this ability deals 20% increased damage.

While slotted, casting any Necromancer ability while you are in combat will count towards the third cast.

name: Venomous Claw
effect:
Rake an enemy with your claw, dealing 456 Poison Damage and an additional 910 Poison Damage over 10 seconds.

The poison seeps into the target and deals increased damage the longer it lasts, dealing 20% more damage every 2 seconds.

Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Poisoned status effect.

name: Vigor
effect: Let loose a battle cry, instilling yourself and nearby allies with resolve and healing them for 1365 Health over 8 seconds.

name: Volatile Armor
effect:
Release your inner Dragon to gain Major Resolve, increasing your Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 5280 for 20 seconds. 

You release a spray of spikes around you, causing enemies hit to take 984 Magic Damage over 10 seconds.

While active, the armor returns 143 Magic Damage to any enemy that uses a direct damage attack against you in melee range.

name: Volcanic Rune
effect:
Inscribe a rune of cosmic fire on the earth, which takes 2 seconds to arm and lasts for 30 seconds.

When triggered, the rune blasts all enemies in the target area for 822 Flame Damage, knocks them into the air, and stuns them for 3 seconds.

name: Volley
effect: Launch a multitude of arrows into the sky to rain down, dealing 151 Physical Damage to enemies in the target area every 1 second for 8 seconds, after a 2 second delay.

name: Wall of Elements
effect:
Slam your staff down to create an elemental barrier in front of you, dealing 108 Magic Damage to enemies in the target area every 1 second.

Wall of Fire deals additional damage to Burning enemies.

Wall of Frost reduces enemy Movement Speed and immobilizes Chilled enemies.

Wall of Storms sets Concussed enemies Off Balance.

name: War Horn
effect: Sound a war horn to rally your forces, increasing you and your group's Maximum Magicka and Maximum Stamina by 10% for 30 seconds.

name: Ward Ally
effect:
Call on your staff's strength to protect you and the lowest health ally around you with a damage shield that absorbs 849 damage.

The shield's strength is increased by up to 100%, depending on the severity of the target's wounds.

name: Warmth
effect: When you deal direct damage with an Ardent Flame ability, you reduce the enemy's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

name: Wayfarer
effect:
Increases your experience gain with the One Hand and Shield skill line by 15%.

Increases the duration of any eaten food by 15 minutes.

name: Weakness to Elements
effect: Send the elements to sap an enemy's defenses and afflict them with Major Breach for 20 seconds, reducing their Spell Resistance by 5280.

name: Werewolf Berserker
effect:
Transform into a beast, fearing nearby enemies for 3 seconds. 

While transformed, your Light Attacks apply a bleed for 1456 Physical Damage over 4 seconds, your Heavy Attacks deal 50% splash damage, and your Maximum Stamina is increased by 30%.

While slotted, your Stamina Recovery is increased by 15%.

name: Werewolf Transformation
effect:
Transform into a beast, fearing nearby enemies for 3 seconds.  

While Transformed your Maximum Stamina is increased by 30%.

While slotted, your Stamina Recovery is increased by 15%.

name: Whirling Blades
effect: Launch yourself into a lethal spin, dealing 706 Physical Damage to nearby enemies. Deals up to 100% more damage to enemies with less than 50% Health.

name: Whirlwind
effect: Launch yourself into a lethal spin, dealing 683 Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

name: Wild Guardian
effect:
Rouse a grizzly to fight by your side. The grizzly swipes at an enemy, dealing 305 Physical Damage, and sometimes swipes all enemies in front of it, dealing 1225 Physical Damage and stunning them for 2 seconds.

Once summoned you can activate Guardian's Savagery for 75 Ultimate, causing the grizzly to maul an enemy for 1385 Physical Damage. Deals 100% more damage to enemies below 25% Health.

name: Wind Walker
effect:
Increases your Stamina Recovery by 4% per piece of Medium Armor equipped. 

Current bonus: 0%.

Reduces the Stamina cost of your abilities by 2% per piece of Medium Armor equipped. 

Current bonus: 0%.

name: Winter's Revenge
effect:
Conjure icy shards at the target location to skewer enemies in the area, dealing 211 Frost Damage every 1 second for 12 seconds.

Enemies hit are overcome with bitter cold, reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

This ability has a higher chance to apply the Chilled status effect.

name: Wood Extraction
effect: Maximizes the chances of extracting Woodworking ingredients and allows the refining of the most powerful resins from raw materials.

name: Woodworking
effect: Allows the use of Sanded Nightwood.

name: World in Ruin
effect:
Increases the damage of your Flame area of effect abilities by 6%.

Decreases the cost of your Stamina Poison abilities by 25%.

name: Wrecking Blow
effect:
Slam an enemy with an upward swing, dealing 1083 Physical Damage.

Grants you Empower for 5 seconds, increasing the damage of your next Light Attack by 40%.

name: Y'ffre's Endurance
effect: Increases your Stamina Recovery by 258.
